Module com.example.schedulingapplication
Package DAO

Class Appointment_DAO

java.lang.Object
DAO.Appointment_DAO
public class Appointment_DAO extends Object
A class used to identify and manipulate database fields for appointments.

      A method to determine if there are any overlapping appointments.
      Parameters:
      tempDate - along with tempStart, tempEnd, and tempCustomer_ID to identify overlapping appointments.
      Returns:
      a boolean value stating whether an overlap exists.
